docs.text:
Home




Portal
 is an open source software that allows you to edit and build minecraft Mod from a web browser.


In addition to using the hosted environment, you can also host your own.


For details on how to prepare for Mod development using Portal, please click 
here
.


Otherwise, please see 
here
 for how to prepare for Mod development using Portal.

docs.text: Portal  is an open source software that allows you to edit and build minecraft Mod from a web browser.  In addition to using the hosted environment, you can also host your own.
